name: Saturnina Rizal
remarks: Remarks: Now in Rizal Shrine in Fort Santiago

name: A painting on a pair of mother-of-pearl
remarks: Remarks: Shells painted by Rizal in Dapitan and given as a gift to Dona Leonor Valenzuela and later passed into the hands of Dona Margarita Valenzuela.

name: Spanish Coat of Arms
remarks: Remarks: Done during a fiesta of San Rafael in Calamba in 1867
